name: Coughing Up a Storm
description:
The people in hazmat suits are out to get ya! Cough up a storm to defend yourself from the invading enemies.

-- CONTROLS --

WASD to move

Press space to perform a quick dash. Your dash makes you invincible for a short time, but be wary of your stamina when dashing.

Hold left click to cough and shoot out snot to fire at your enemies.

Charge up your ultimate by killing enemies and pressed E to get a short power-up. While your ultimate is active, your dash gains to ability to do damage.
